competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: 15 GB free vs Dropbox 2 GB, better collaboration and value

competitors.name: MEGA
competitors.notes: End-to-end encryption by default, 20 GB free storage

competitors.name: Sync.com
competitors.notes: User-friendly, robust security, reliable file syncing

competitors.name: Tresorit
competitors.notes: Best for business with compliance certifications

competitors.name: Icedrive
competitors.notes: Web, desktop, Android and iOS availability

competitors.name: Box
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused with enhanced security and collaboration

competitors.name: Nextcloud
competitors.notes: Collaboration solution for consumers and businesses

competitors.name: IDrive
competitors.notes: Top online backup service with syncing and file sharing

context: By 2024, Dropbox faces intense competition. Key limitations: no end-to-end encryption, 2 GB free plan, expensive pricing ($6.99 for 2 TB). Market segmented into tech giants, privacy/security-focused providers, enterprise solutions, and cost-effective alternatives.
